header_dircation: Back in 2012 we had a vision, we had a dream of making the world a better place and give the world the exact solutions it needs, so we put the first brick in view plus to make that vision clear and to fulfill that dream, view plus isn’t a company and we do not intend to be a one, view plus is simply a solution, and a smart one!
Vision_dircation: We had a dream and with wisdom and knowlage we made it very clear, we want to make a change, We want a better life cy clenot only for companies but also for humans, And we know excatly how we do that.
Mission_dircation: Everyone has a certain mission that they are called to fulfil, And we had our call, We are here not for just making a change, But, we are here to inspire, to help, to solve, Thats our code and as told before we are not a company and we do not intend to be a one, We are View Plus.
smart_dircation: Educational and Awareness, Designed to target the most prevalent groups in different regions of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Through installing tablets at waiting areas such as (Hospitals, Clinics, Beauty salons, Hotels and Sports clubs).
Evaluation_dircation: Our Emojis expressions are easy to use and easy to enable the customer to send his voice directly to the decision-makers without any hindrance and the ease of collecting their customer data. It makes it very easy to follow and analyze comments, as it enables you to save time and energy to focus on making customer opinions better.
Veyolo_dircation: An application specially designed to help the owners of trucks and rent cars to organize all financial transactions and the entire rental process that takes place between the tenant and the tenant from him
